Summary: Flew very fast, solid white light. Round.
divs: Sighting DetailsWe saw a solid white light, not airplane flashing lights, above crossing over our heads in a very fast manor. Afterwards, we saw and heard commercial jets, not the same look. 20 minutes later we saw it again, it got really bright and bigger for about 2 seconds then the light went back to a small dot that kept on getting smaller and not moving across the sky but getting smaller in a stationary position untill we could not see it.
trends: There have been 106 other sightings in Colorado Springs
There were no other sightings in Colorado Springs on or around June 30th 2009
